ygData.subject: Update (Paladin Holy Sword List)
ygData.msgSnippet: Pearl Bladed Claymore Damage:  17 Delay:  40 Type: 2H Slashing Weight:  10.0 Note: Not sure if this is actually a holy sword or not, it was marked as being a
ygData.messageBody:
Pearl Bladed Claymore
Damage: 17
Delay: 40
Type: 2H Slashing
Weight: 10.0
Note: Not sure if this is actually a holy sword or not, it was marked as being a Paladin only sword, on the Everlore site (http://www.everlore.com)

Ghoulbane
Damage: 15
Delay: 34
Type: 1H Slashing
Effect: Dismiss Undead
Weight: Unconfirmed, either 9.5 - 14.5
Note: If you are not worthy of wielding the sword (Not high enough level) you will receive the message: "You do not have the will to command this weapon."

Soulfire
No information recorded.

Fiery Avenger
Quest item
No other information recorded

Zweil
No information recorded.

Sword of Al'Akbakkar (sp) (While adventuring in "an Estate of Unrest" I saw over auctions this sword being sold for 900 platinum, and that it was a Holy Sword. No stats or anything else provided. This just may be a rumor .. just reporting what I saw.
No information recorded.
